intro:
Mix, match, and merge!
Watch fruits grow bigger and juicier 
How far can you go?
description:
Puzzle Fruit Merge – Match Game

Enjoy a simple yet addictive puzzle experience where every move counts.
Merge identical fruits, watch them grow, and aim to create the biggest fruit possible. The rules are easy to understand, but mastering the balance and timing takes skill. If the basket overflows, the game ends—so plan each drop carefully.

Features

• Simple and relaxing gameplay for all ages
• Smooth physics and colorful fruit visuals
• Easy to pick up, challenging to master
• Endless replay value with dynamic difficulty
• Perfect for quick breaks or long play sessions

Puzzle Fruit Merge – Match Game delivers a satisfying, casual puzzle challenge that anyone can enjoy.
How big can your fruit grow?
